answers.answer: Hi,Could you just post the lab and other  test reports?

question: Hi i am 17 year old female i have been getting tested over the past 2 years for symptoms i havei get nauseapassing outfatiguecold sweatsfeeling as im going to pass outand feeling weakalot of the times i can feel this stuff in my head its hard to explaini have things tested in my blood, for adrenal gland disease, a rare disease that i dont know the name of, diabetes type one, and poly cystic ovary syndromei do have pcos my doctor may think that is something to do with my nerves or i might have type 2 diabetesplease do you have any ideas what can cause all of this
